<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2305</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The sinus curve of Simple Harmonic Motion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Kurvekurve der einfachen harmonischen 
Bewegung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La courbe de sinus du mouvement harmonique 
simple</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A curva do sinus do movimento harmonic simples</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La curva del seno di movimento armonico semplice</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η καμπύλη κόλπων της απλής αρμονικής κίνησης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La curva del sino del movimiento armónico 
simple</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the formation of a sinus curve produced by the simple harmonic motion of a single point in uniform circular motion</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mechanics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">harmonic motion</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die die Anordnung einer 
Kurvekurve zeigt, produzierte durch die einfache harmonische Bewegung 
eines einzelnen Punktes in der konstanten kreisförmigen Bewegung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre la formation d'une 
courbe de sinus a produit par le mouvement harmonique simple d'un seul
point dans le mouvement circulaire uniforme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstrasse a formação de uma
curva do sinus produziu pelo movimento harmonic simples de um único 
ponto no movimento circular uniforme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra la formazione di una 
curva del seno ha prodotto tramite il movimento armonico semplice di 
singolo punto nel movimento della circonvallazione dell'uniforme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει το σχηματισμό μιας 
καμπύλης κόλπων που παράγεται από την απλή αρμονική κίνηση 
ενός ενιαίου σημείου στην ομοιόμορφη κυκλική κίνηση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra la formación de una
curva del sino produjo por el movimiento armónico simple de una sola 
punta en el movimiento circular uniforme</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mechaniker</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonische Bewegung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mécanique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement harmonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mecânicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">meccanici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento armonico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φυσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηχανικοί</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
